description:
Because their mother Haruko is staying with them, Haru continues to watch his public displays of affection with Ren. Without much consideration for his situation, Ikuyoshi asks Haru a question. Meanwhile, unable to express his feelings for Haru, Ren and his classmate Juuzen question their school`s doctor Takamura. One day, after hearing about Haru`s medical checkup after the accident, Aki aggressively attacks Haruko...
Source: crunchyroll
